Class TomcatProperties

java.lang.Object
krystal.framework.tomcat.TomcatProperties
public class TomcatProperties extends Object
Define properties through convenient
invalid reference 
TomcatProperties#builder()
method.
baseDir
Root dir for all other Tomcat references.
Default:
invalid reference 
exposedDirPath
/tomcat
hostName
Default: localhost
port
Default: 8080
defaultServletsContext
Root mapping for default context.
Default: /api
servlets
The list of KrystalServlets or other HttpServlets to be added to the default context created.
webappsDir
Root directory to store web applications in.
Default: /webapps
appName
Defines the top level root context for the web application, added by providing appSrc. Any whitespaces and slash characters will be replaced with "_".
Default: /app
appSrc
When provided, the TomcatFactory loads web application's content from given source - if .war file -> will unpack into ./baseDir/webappsDir/appName/ or if the path to dir already present in the file system -> will be addressed directly.
appSrcAsCollection
If true and appSrc is a directory, it will import .war files content from it and treat it's top-level sub-dirs as web-apps directly.
connectionTimeout
Connection timeout set for the Connector. If the request is not served within given time, it will be discarded (page will output error 500 though). Equivalent of Connector.setAsyncTimeout(long).
Default (ms): 30000
connectorSettings
Manual processing of Connector. Applied in the end if present.
